classes.name: Melee
classes.description: Encompassing characters that revolve around short ranged, weapon combat.

classes.name: Ranged
classes.description: Encompassing characters that revolve around long ranged combat, including bows, guns, etc.

classes.name: Magus
classes.description: Encompassing characters that revolve around the use of magic, specifically arcane.

classes.name: Tank
classes.description: Encompassing tankier characters revolving around shield or durability.

classes.name: Divine
classes.description: Betowed upon characters of heavenly, holy, or divine powers or origin.

classes.name: Mortal
classes.description: Describing more normal characters, hand-to-hand combat included.

classes.name: Demonic
classes.description: Featuring characters of unholy power or origin, monsterous.

classes.name: Monster
classes.description: Inhuman beasts, Enemies of unknown or animalistic origin.
